name: Super mario maker recreation (Unity Engine)
description:
Here is super mario maker! A game where you can create, share, play levels. Note that this will not be possible in this version of the game. 

WARNING: All music, sounds, sprites, assets belong to Nintendo. I am not stealing.

And you will not be able to mod this game because it is completely useless.

There is a level created by the game.

Note that this is a fangame of Mario maker 2. And you can only put super mario world.

And there is not a android version.
